config.banner: It's so close to the road, yet so far from civilization, and nobody seems to know much about it. It's been taunting you for months. But its secrets will not last much longer. You are ready.

lantern.initial: Your heavy-duty electric lantern is hanging from a hook.
lantern.name: Electric lantern
lantern.description: It's a heavy-duty electric lantern. You changed the batteries just this morning.

low-cave.drop: There's a splash in the water below. As you squint, a slightly darker spot is being carried east by the current, but that's probably your imagination.
low-cave.name: Lower cavern
low-cave.description: Countless points of light dot the high ceiling of the cavern, framing the jagged teeth of stalactites and stalagmites in the background. An underground lake take up most of the floor, leaving only a narrow ledge along what must be the south side. Off to the east, all that water flows noisily down a tunnel, while in the opposite direction lies a maze of confusing passages. But there's no way to miss the rope climbing upwards through a hole.

rbank.description: The pine trees shy away from the bank here, leaving enough room to pitch a tent. The riverbed is broad and deep, making the water calm enough to row safely despite the strong current. Straight across, the cave mouth beckons with its darkness-shrouded mysteries, while behind the tent to the south a rocky trail vanishes into the forest.
rbank.name: Right riverbank

lbank-e.failure: You can't exactly row a boat up a rocky trail.
lbank-e.name: east

the-end.description: "Congratulations!" shouts the funnily-dressed man who just climbed out of a van. You never heard it coming. "You are the first winner of our new reality show! I would invite you to claim your prize, but you already have it. Tell me, how does it feel?" The woman in a business suit who is with him flashes an embarrassed smile. "We should probably mention that you are on camera."
the-end.success: And that's when things started taking a turn for the weirder...
the-end.name: Surprise!

map.description: The paint is faded, and the lines shaky, but the map can only depict the cave system. You recognize the entrance tunnel and this room. A certain passage off a grand hall is clearly marked.
map.name: mural map

nook.description: Broken slabs of rock leaning against the wall and each other mask a recess right off the main cavern. Here and there, puddles of bone-chilling water on the uneven ground shimmer eerily, reflecting the fake stars above.
nook.name: Hidden nook

lbank.description: The ground raises abruptly away from the bank, unbroken but for a hole in the mountainside not far up. Towards the east, a narrow footpath follows the water downstream. Moist ground yields underfoot with every step, and the sound of running water echoes from all sides.
lbank.name: Left riverbank

low-cave-u.failure: No way you're going to climb a rope while carrying a treasure chest.
low-cave-u.name: up

karst.description: Water gushes out through a crevice in the mountain side, and pools into a small basin before flowing into the river at the far end. Fallen branches form an impromptu net that catches all kinds of floating debris, not far from the path.
karst.name: Karst spring

roadside.description: You parked your SUV not far from the road, not hidden, but discreetly. Seldom does the growl of a passing car break up the wind singing in the treetops, but the smell of exhaust persists, clashing with the perfume of green needles.
roadside.name: Roadside

roadside-se.success: You unlock the car, and proceed to hide your finding at the bottom of the spacious trunk. Opening it can wait. When you look up again, someone else is there...
roadside-se.failure: You're too ambitious to go home without any treasure from the cave.
roadside-se.name: pack up

rbank-s.failure: You can't exactly row a boat up a rocky trail.
rbank-s.name: south

boat.description: It's a small inflatable row boat that cost you an equally small fortune. But no matter, soon it will all pay off.
boat.name: inflatable boat

ball.drop: You let go of the ball.
ball.description: It's damp, but otherwise in decent condition, everything considered.
ball.name: tennis ball

up-cave.failure: Daylight duly dwindles away from the cave mouth, as the tunnel twists and turns. Soon, your own echoing footsteps are the only guide in the darkness.
up-cave.name: Upper cavern
up-cave.success: You forgot your rope in the SUV, but there is one already, clinging to the floor of an abrupt slide into darkness. Rough steps climb around a pillar in which someone carved a little shelf.
up-cave.description: Daylight duly dwindles away from the cave mouth. Cold moisture in the air clings to the skin; the walls shine wetly in the electric glare.

tentflap.description: A small but sturdy triangle tent, its canvas brightly colored.
tentflap.success: You bend down and crawl into the tent.
tentflap.name: your tent

tent.description: The tent has room for little more than a bedroll, but then your SUV isn't far away either. It will do for a day or two.
tent.name: Your tent

up-cave-d.failure: No way you're climbing down a rope with lantern in hand.
up-cave-d.name: down

chest.description: It's a treasure chest just like in pirate movies, except very small and light. Sturdy, too, despite that.
chest.name: Treasure chest

lbank-sw.failure: Swimming in a cold mountain river? No thanks.
lbank-sw.name: southwest

aerie.description: It's a tall, narrow room where every wall bears the mark of tools, and fossilized wood splinters crunch underfoot. High above, cracks in the rock admit slivers of daylight; the air is dry, and not as cold as down in the tunnel.
aerie.name: Aerie

rbank-ne.failure: Swimming in a cold mountain river? No thanks.
rbank-ne.name: northeast
